Recent observations reveal a puzzling pattern regarding the research phenomenon. Based on the conversation, the researcher has identified an empirical anomaly: 

This finding appears to contradict established theoretical predictions. The discrepancy between what theory predicts and what has been observed presents a genuine research puzzle worthy of systematic investigation. Understanding this pattern could advance our theoretical knowledge and provide practical insights for practitioners in the field.

Recent observations reveal a puzzling pattern regarding venture and theory. Based on the conversation, the researcher has identified an empirical anomaly: I want to refine the puzzle further. The key tension is between entrepreneurial orientation theory and resource-based view predictions about new venture performance.

This finding appears to contradict established theoretical predictions. The discrepancy between what theory predicts and what has been observed presents a genuine research puzzle worthy of systematic investigation. Understanding this pattern could advance our theoretical knowledge and provide practical insights for practitioners in the field.
